summary: Changes Housecarls to be Dark Elves.
descriptionHtml:
I\'m playing a run through of a prejudice Dark Elf that only runs with his own kind. So, I wanted my housecarls to be of the same race.

This mod changes all 5 housecarls to Dark Elves, and tweaks their appearance. Also changed the appearance of Avrusa_Sarethi. I also changed Argis to be a 2H user, Calder to be a ranger, and Jordis to be an Assassin.

Update : Forgot to add the textures to the first file. Added in new file. Changed Lydia.

*********** TO INSTALL *************
1. Put MY_Changes.esp & the meshes folder in your Skyrim Data folder. (DEFAULT ... : C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data).
1a. The 6 pictures are just pictures of the changed characters from the Creation Kit. The Readme is just a readme. Nothing needs to be done with them.
2. Go to your Skyrim Play menu, and select \"Data Files\", tick the My_Changes.esp box

** IMPORTANT - Be sure to have it set to load AFTER any companion changing mod (such as UFO) in your load list.

************ TO UNINSTALL ****************

Remove MY_Changes.esp & the following folders 
000A2C8C.NIF
000A2C8E.NIF
000A2C8F.NIF
000A2C90.NIF
000A2C91.NIF
00019BFE.NIF

from C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\Actor\\Character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\Skyrim.esm

*************** REQUIRED MODS *******************
None.


************* COMPATIBILITY *******************

Compatible with UFO, should be compatible with everything else. 
Not compatible with mods that change any of the housecarls.
I don\'t have Dawnguard, and am not sure what the compatibility with it would be.
Also - I have no idea if or how the NMM button works. I only manually add files, and don\'t use it myself.

************* FEEDBACK ************************
Endorse if you like it. Feel free to let me know how it\'s working, and post some screenshots of what they look like in your game.
author: Dolic
